name: Driver bonus
verify: Being the car driver of the team this week.

name: Try something new bonus
verify: Every player that attends five consecutive MOVE! meetings will obtain a reliable passenger badge.

name: Consume less calories
verify: In the Fitbit app, enter the foods you consumed to your food log
descriptions1: Daily calory intake lower than 2,500 calorieson 3 days next week.
descriptions2: Daily calori intake lower than 2,500 calories on 5 or more days next week.

name: Drink more water
verify: In the Fitbit app, enter the water you drinked to your water log
descriptions1: Drink more than 11.5 cups (2.7 L) of fluids on 3 days next week.
descriptions2: Drink more than 11.5 cups (2.7 L) of fluids on 5 or more days next week.

name: Walk more
verify: Wear fitbit watch and synchronize you steps in the Fitbit app
descriptions2: 6,000 steps on 5 or more days next week.

name: Burn more calories
verify: Wear fitbit watch and synchronize you steps in the Fitbit app
descriptions1: Burn 3,000 calories daily on 3 days next week.
descriptions2: Burn 2,500 calories on 5 or more days next week.

name: Loss weight
verify: Use fitbit scale to measure your weight and upload your weight to fitbit app.
